archimate:BusinessService.name: ACH Fulfillment
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: A payment is made between two customers of different banks. The payment is processed via an automated clearing house.
General comment:
Business Purpose : Operate the ACH access gateway
Пример использования: Оплата производится между двумя клиентами разных банков. Оплата производится через автоматизированную клиринговую палату.
Общее замечание:
деловая цель : Управление шлюзом доступа ACH
Service Domain - ACH Fulfillment This service domain handles the operational interface with an external automated clearing house (ACH) service. It handles the sending and receipt of batched transactions, servicing reporting and executes the schedule of service operations.
Detailed Summary This service domain operates the Automated Clearing House (ACH) access gateway between the bank and the ACH service provider.
Executive Summary This service domain operates the Automated Clearing House (ACH) access gateway between the bank and the ACH service provider
Examples Of Use A payment is made between two customers of different banks. The payment is processed via an automated clearing house.
